title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY
review: I was sooooo disappointed with this movie.  Why you ask?  Because it wasn't scary.  There were no special effects, not like I'm really big on them but a few would have been nice; you don't see blood, guts, anything of that. There were no special twists, nothing to make you go 'ahhhhh so thats why they . . .'  Plain and simple, it was terrible.Wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy.
